name: flabbergasted-ui-kit
title: Flabbergasted
desc: A bold dark-mode SaaS template for modern AI products.
article:
Flabbergasted is a dark-mode SaaS template built for fast-moving startups and AI products.


  • Learn more about Flabbergasted
  • Get the full access bundle including all premium themes and lifetime access: https://lexingtonthemes.com/

Pages included

  1. Home page
  2. About
  3. Contact
  4. Sign in
  5. Sign up
  6. Blog (CC)
  7. Tag index
  8. Tag category
  9. RSS
  10. Search
  11. Customers (CC)
  12. Integrations
  13. Help Center (CC)
  14. Changelog (CC)
  15. Team (CC)
  16. Legal pages (CC)
  17. 404


CC = Content Collections

Features

  • Reusable components
  • Search powered with Fuse JS
  • Content collections
  • Seo Optimized
  • Ongoing updates
  • Style guide
  • Astro RSS
  • Astro SEO
  • Astro Sitemap
  • Tailwind CSS Forms
  • Tailwind CSS Prose
